Header: Murder suspect killed in police fire
Content: An individual has been killed by police fire in the Ellangala-Minuwangoda area. According to the Police Media Unit the suspect had attempted to murder a woman In a house. An area resident had notified the police emergency service that the 63 year old suspect was attempting to impale a woman with a sharp object. Accordingly police officers who had arrived at the scene had shot at the suspect. The deceased suspect is a 45 year old father of one.
